rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer with Art Deco design elements and intricate moldings.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large open-plan living area with geometric patterns and elegant finishes, following Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room; designed with a mix of modern and traditional Art Deco elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space incorporating Vastu guidelines for cooking area placement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom featuring Art Deco accents and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Additional sleeping area for guests, designed with comfortable furnishings and Vastu-aligned decor.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-planned bathroom integrating modern fixtures and ergonomic design.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet study/library space with bookshelves and ambient lighting, designed to promote mental clarity.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped fitness area integrated into the farmhouse layout for personal use.

openings.description: A grand entrance featuring Art Deco detailing in line with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Large windows placed strategically to enhance natural lighting and ventilation, adhering to Vastu guidelines.
Functional doors with ornate Art Deco designs ensuring smooth flow between spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with panoramic views of the rooftop terrace and Art Deco design details.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace Access
rooms.description: Connects to the expansive rooftop terrace; designed for relaxation and outdoor living.

openings.description: A well-designed staircase with Art Deco accents facilitating safe movement between floors.
Strategically placed for optimum natural light and to maintain privacy.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An expansive outdoor space with seating areas, greenery, and panoramic views designed following Vastu principles for harmony with nature.

openings.description: Provides safe and easy access to the rooftop terrace.
Essential for safety while maintaining a sleek Art Deco aesthetic.

note.vastu_alignment: The design integrates Vastu principles by ensuring the entrance faces east or north, living areas receive ample natural light and ventilation, and quiet spaces like the library are placed in appropriate locations to enhance focus.
note.art_deco_features: Ornamental details, geometric patterns, bold colors and high-quality materials have been incorporated into both interior and exterior elements.
note.plot_utilization: The plan is designed for an 80x100 feet plot with careful zoning to maximize functional space while maintaining privacy and open areas.
